name: eARth 3033
description:
Team Korrolande's final prototype for the game "EARTH 3033", a stealth game in a world where AR is used for everything, but big companies are restricting access for many. Your job is to sneak your way into the mainframe building and hack the system, making it available to everyone.

- Controls -

Movement - WASD 

Run - Shift

Hacking - hold left click for four seconds on orange terminals to temporarily disable the cameras hooked up to them.

CREDITS:
